name: Timeline Questions from the 1980s Quiz | History | 10 Questions

questions.text: Rock Hudson is the first major public figure to die of AIDS at 59 in which year?
questions.explanation:
1985.

	He died of the disease on October 2, 1985.

questions.text: In which year did private satellite dishes pop up after receiving the go ahead from the FCC?
questions.explanation:
1981.

	By the end of the decade there were two million satellites dishes in homes around the United States.  By the end of the 90's they were available to millions more homes on a much smaller scale.

questions.text: Late night television gets its first regular African-American host in which year?
In which year did "The Oprah Winfrey Show" debut?
questions.explanation:
1986.

	The program was originally called "A.M. Chicago" and debuted on September 8, 1986.  Oprah is now one of the most successful talk show hosts ever.

questions.text: On November 21 of *which* year did we finally find out who shot J.R.?
questions.explanation:
1980.

	Half of the nation's viewers tuned into this "Dallas" episode making it one of the most watched in television history.

questions.text: Ozzy Osbourne bites the head off a live bat that is thrown at him during a performance on January 20 of which year?
questions.explanation:
1982.

	Ozzy Osbourne would later go on to have a successful reality TV show in the early part of the 21st century.

questions.text: Karen Carpenter dies of anorexia nervosa on February 4 of which year?
questions.explanation:
1983.

	Karen died of heart failure while she was recovering from the effects of anorexia.

questions.text: Actress Robin Givens files for divorce from Mike Tyson on October 7 of which year?
questions.explanation:
1988.

	Robin claimed that the world heavy-weight champion was violent.

questions.text: Run-DMC becomes the first rap group to have an album go gold in which year?
Pete Rose is banned from baseball for life for gambling on sports in which year?
questions.explanation:
1989.

	At the time he was banned he was the manager of the Cincinnati Reds.
